item.title: An implementation of a fragment of Heim & Kratzer (1998)'s NL semantics
item.description: I made a little attempt to give an implementation of some features of Heim & Kratzer (1998) using Haskell, which covers the semantic calculation of one-place predicates applied to entities and generalized quantifiers applied to (pairs of) one-place predicates. Usage Launch GHCi, load the source code below, and make your queries. Examples: Prelude> :l GQ.hs Prelude> sleep Mary False Prelude> a student sleep True Source code Shown below.

item.title: Website renewal
item.description: I’ve changed the generating engine of my website from Wordpress to Hugo with my original bibliography manager morepo. The nice things about using a static website generator are that you don’t need CGI on your server, and that you can have a simpler way of managing your contents. The multi-lingual support of Hugo also impresses me a lot. I’m now still working on migrating the contents from the old website, which is taking more of my time.
